text: Hey y’all, here’s the listing of free & open source tools for data visualization we went through today <https://opensource.com/life/15/6/eight-open-source-data-visualization-tools>

attachments.title: 8 excellent open source data visualization tools
attachments.text: Data visualization is the mechanism of taking tabular or spatial data and conveying it in a human-friendly and visual way. In this article we look at eight open source tools that can help you to create useful and informative graphs.
attachments.fallback: Opensource.com: 8 excellent open source data visualization tools

text: Hope some of you will try these out and get back to us about your experiences
